solution_line_template: There were {seeds_per_color} seeds planted for each of the {num_colors} colors of flower, so there were {seeds_per_color} * {num_colors} = <<{seeds_per_color}*{num_colors}={total_seeds_planted}>>{total_seeds_planted} flowers planted.
The fungus killed 25 red, 31 yellow, 30 orange, and 40 purple flowers, {killed_red} + {killed_yellow} + {killed_orange} + {killed_purple} = {total_flowers_killed} flowers dead.
This leaves {total_seeds_planted} - {total_flowers_killed} = <<{total_seeds_planted}-{total_flowers_killed}={remaining_flowers}>>{remaining_flowers} flowers for the bouquets.

If the florist puts {flowers_per_bouquet} flowers in each bouquet, he can make {remaining_flowers} / {flowers_per_bouquet} = <<{remaining_flowers}/{flowers_per_bouquet}={num_bouquets}>>{num_bouquets} bouquets this weekend.
